title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.4 - Electronic toll collection tags
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.4 - Electronic toll collection tags

State Regulations

One receiver-transmitter issued by a tolling facility in
connection with electronic toll collection may be affixed to the upper or lower
center portion of the windshield, depending upon the type of vehicle, in
accordance with mounting instructions provided by the tolling
facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
174.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
